## Statistics.(constructor)

Sets up a group of timers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(name?: string | undefined, enabled?: boolean);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string \| undefined | The statistics name, for logging purposes. |
|  enabled | boolean | If <code>false</code>, the timers do not measure the performance. |
